item.title: Opinion Poll by BMG Research for The Independent, 20–22 May 2019 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Conservative Party (ECR): 6–9 seats
  • Labour Party (S&D): 12–16 seats
  • Liberal Democrats (ALDE): 9–12 seats
  • Scottish National Party (Greens/EFA): 2–3 seats
  • Plaid Cymru (Greens/EFA): 1–2 seats

  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 1–3 seats
  • Brexit Party (BREXIT): 29–34 seats
  • Change UK (ALDE): 0 seats
